isis.stitle: POWER STEERING PUMPS LUK VT73 AND LF93 - CLEAN AND INSPECT

svcproc.title: CLEAN
svcproc.para: All parts must be thoroughly cleaned and kept clean during inspection and assembly. The close tolerance of the parts makes this important. Clean all removed parts, using a commercial solvent that is compatible with the system fluid. Compressed air may be used in cleaning, but it must be filtered to remove water and other contaminants. Clean, compressed air is particularly useful in cleaning spools, orifices and cover passages.

step1.para: Discard the used shaft seal and all O-rings. Wash the metal parts in a solvent, blow them dry with filtered, compressed air and place them on a clean surface for inspection.
Stone all mating surfaces of the body and cover with an Arkansas stone to remove burrs and sharp edges. Wash and blow dry after stoning.
